Your argument and hothead made me ask u for your passport. That was when I knew who I was arguing with. Though my colleague won’t hear of it then. I look at u now and smile with admiration n respect. What I like about ur writing is the earthy nature and unpretentious.readiing ur book one might think u r from nsukka in Enugu.
